chatrecap.title: Your Chat Analysis Results
chatrecap.description: Discover insights about your conversation patterns and relationship dynamics
chatrecap.overview_story_part1: Your conversation tells a beautiful story through {totalMessages} messages exchanged over time. {sender1Name} sent {sender1Messages} messages, while {sender2Name} responded with {sender2Messages} messages.
chatrecap.overview_story_part2: Together, you've woven a tapestry of {totalWords} words, with {sender1Name} contributing {sender1Words} words and {sender2Name} sharing {sender2Words} words. Your conversations are meaningful and substantial, with an average of {wordsPerMessage} words per message.
chatrecap.overview_story_part3: Your most active conversations happen on {mostActiveDay}, with an average of {avgMessagesPerDay} messages exchanged daily. The typical response time of {responseTime} shows the eager anticipation you both feel when communicating with each other.
chatrecap.timespan_summary: Your story began on {startDate}, unfolding over {duration}, until {endDate}‚Äîleaving an everlasting mark in the passage of time.
chatrecap.timespan_fallback: Your story unfolded over time, leaving an everlasting mark in the passage of time.
chatrecap.sentiment_description: Your conversations have a sentiment score of {sentimentScore}, which indicates a {sentimentDescription} emotional tone. This reflects the overall mood and feeling of your exchanges.
chatrecap.daily_activity_description: Your conversations are most active on {mostActiveDay}s around {mostActiveHour}. This consistent pattern suggests you both prioritize making time for each other during these periods.
chatrecap.time_distribution_description: You tend to chat most during the evening ({evening}%), followed by afternoon ({afternoon}%) and morning ({morning}%). This pattern shows when you're both most available and engaged in conversation.
chatrecap.response_pattern_description: Your conversation style shows {responsePattern}. This indicates {conversationLength} throughout your exchanges.

aiInsight.title: AI Relationship Insights
aiInsight.description: Discover deeper insights about your relationship dynamics powered by AI

relationship_metrics_hearts.title: Relationship Quality Metrics
relationship_metrics_hearts.description: Analysis of key relationship quality indicators based on communication patterns.

relationship_analysis.description: Analysis of communication patterns and relationship dynamics based on message history.

personality_insights.description: Analysis of individual communication styles and personality traits.

errors.loading_failed: Failed to load AI insights. Please try again.

interestLevel.detail: Alice shows high interest in the conversation, frequently initiating new topics and asking follow-up questions. She responds to almost all messages and shows curiosity about Bob's opinions and experiences.

responseEnthusiasm.detail: Alice's messages are often enthusiastic, using exclamation marks and positive language. She frequently uses emojis to express excitement and engagement with the conversation.

emotionalStability.detail: Alice maintains a consistent positive tone throughout conversations. Even during disagreements, she remains calm and constructive, rarely showing signs of emotional volatility.

responseTime.detail: Alice typically responds within 30 minutes during active conversation periods, though sometimes takes longer during work hours. She rarely leaves messages unanswered for more than a day.

interestLevel.detail: Bob demonstrates good interest in conversations, though he tends to respond more than initiate. He engages well with topics Alice introduces and occasionally brings up new subjects of his own.

responseEnthusiasm.detail: Bob's communication style is more reserved, with fewer exclamation marks and emojis than Alice. His enthusiasm is more evident when discussing specific topics like movies and technology.

emotionalStability.detail: Bob maintains a steady emotional tone in most conversations. He rarely shows frustration and tends to approach disagreements with a logical perspective rather than emotional reactions.

responseTime.detail: Bob is very prompt with responses, typically replying within 15 minutes when active. He's consistent about checking messages and rarely leaves conversations hanging.

intimacy.detail: The conversation shows a good level of intimacy with regular sharing of personal experiences and feelings. Both parties feel comfortable discussing their daily lives and occasional deeper topics, though some emotional reserve is still present.

communication.detail: Communication flows naturally with minimal misunderstandings. Both parties express themselves clearly and ask clarifying questions when needed. Conversations have a good balance of listening and sharing from both sides.

trust.detail: There's a strong foundation of trust evident in their willingness to share personal information and vulnerabilities. Neither party shows signs of withholding information or being guarded in their communication.

conflict.detail: Very little conflict appears in the conversations. When disagreements arise, they're handled respectfully with both parties willing to consider the other's perspective. No instances of heated arguments or lasting tension were observed.

points.title: Complementary Communication Styles
points.description: Alice's enthusiasm balances well with Bob's more measured approach, creating a dynamic where both parties feel heard and valued.

points.title: Shared Intellectual Curiosity
points.description: Both demonstrate interest in learning and discussing new ideas, which strengthens their connection through meaningful exchanges.

points.title: Mutual Respect
points.description: Their conversations show consistent patterns of acknowledging each other's opinions and perspectives, even when they differ.

points.title: Growth Opportunity
points.description: They could benefit from more vulnerable discussions about future hopes and fears, which are currently touched on but not explored deeply.

suggestedTopics: Future aspirations and how you might support each other's goals
Deeper exploration of childhood experiences that shaped your values
Philosophical discussions about life purpose and meaning
Travel dreams and potential shared adventures
Creative projects you might enjoy working on together

messageTips: Consider setting aside dedicated time for deeper conversations without distractions
Try sharing more vulnerable thoughts when discussing challenging topics
Acknowledge each other's messages even when busy, with a quick response indicating you'll reply more fully later
Continue the positive pattern of asking follow-up questions to show engagement
Balance practical discussions with more playful, imaginative exchanges
